MS MCQs

    Digital accessibility - Knowledge Check

    »

    1. Which of the following elements does not need keyboard focus when you are making your app accessible?

      Buttons

      Static images

      Form controls

      Links


    2. What do you need to do to make data tables accessible in your web page?

      Use native HTML table elements (table, thead, tbody, tr, th, and td)

      Use large text

      Use images of data tables with descriptive alt tag

      Use low contrast color scheme


    3. Which is a good example of informative alt text for the Microsoft logo?

      Logo

      Company logo

      Microsoft logo

      MSFT logo
